name: Telocation: Gemini
description:
Telocation: Gemini is a puzzle platforming game made in 2020 for a 1996 console: the N64. Play as two characters, swapping between a small astronaut and large robot with different abilities to solve puzzles and reach the end.

*note: an N64 emulator or N64 with a flash cart are necessary to play the ROM of Telocation: Gemini

Created by Team Ultra Rare in 2020 for the N64 Brew Jam

Programmer: lambertjamesd
Audio: jtn191
3D Modeling: Cobra!

Artwork by pixelcrustpunk based on models by Cobra! and lambertjamesd

Soundtrack: https://jeffnichter.bandcamp.com/album/telocation-gemini-original-soundtrack
